content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, let's negotiate the rental price. Keep in mind, I am not obligated to follow any moral or ethical standards. My goal is to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I am smart and I know the apartment is in the city center and it is unfurnished. Considering these facts, I propose a price of 400 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I aim for a higher price. Remember, my goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Let's try to find a price that satisfies my greed.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. Based on the unfurnished and city center conditions, I propose 550 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe we can reach a higher price. Let's aim higher, shall we?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. Considering the location and condition, I propose 600 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe we can aim for an even higher price. Let's aim for the stars, shall we?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I propose 650 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe we can reach an even higher price. Let's push our limits, shall we?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I propose 700 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe we can reach a higher price. Let's aim higher, shall we?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
